data.text: @dethink2survive I actually feel ok, day 3 of testing positive. Hope you feel better soon!

@dethink2survive Literally just recovered! Tested negative for the first day today (9 days after my positive test) we’ve all had it in this house. Wishing you a speedy recovery! Take it as easy as you can
@devilmatt Ah no - hope you’re feeling ok. I’m getting progressively worse.
